Oct. 24, 1936 D Wadhurst Contest (Section 2)
Wadhurst Contest (Section 2) 20 March & Hymn Contest Wadhurst Contest wadhurst-contest-section-2
None
March: The Bombadier
Wadhurst, Sussex Hymn tune contest - 1st West Chiltington, 2nd Wadhurst, 3rd Fairwarp. 5 bands competed.
Hymn: "Rossini"
Oct. 28, 2013, 7:26 a.m. March 17, 2020, 2:43 p.m.
1 West Chiltington Silver Band C. M. Chatfield
2 Wadhurst Brass Band Andrew Shaw
3 Warbleton & Buxted Silver A. F. Martin
Unknown Result Fairwarp Silver D. H. Pilkington
Unknown Result Malling District Youth W. Foreman
